entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 11:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
